isDark.comment: a boolean value that indicates whether the theme is dark or light.

windowBgOver.comment: light gray: fallback for background with mouse over

windowBgRipple.comment: darker gray: fallback for ripple effect

windowFgOver.comment: black: fallback for text with mouse over

windowSubTextFgOver.comment: darker gray: fallback for additional text with mouse over

windowBoldFg.comment: dark gray: fallback for bold text

windowBoldFgOver.comment: dark gray: fallback for bold text with mouse over

windowBgActive.comment: bright blue: fallback for blue filled active areas

windowFgActive.comment: white: fallback for text on active areas

windowActiveTextFg.comment: online blue: fallback for active text like online status

windowShadowFgFallback.comment: gray: fallback for shadow without opacity

slideFadeOutBg.comment: slide animation (chat to profile) fade out filling

slideFadeOutShadowFg.comment: slide animation (chat to profile) fade out right section shadow

imageBg.comment: image background fallback (when photo size is less than minimum allowed)

imageBgTransparent.comment: image background when displaying an image with opacity where no opacity is needed

activeButtonBgOver.comment: default active button background with mouse over

activeButtonFgOver.comment: default active button text with mouse over

activeButtonSecondaryFg.comment: default active button additional text (selected messages counter in forward / delete buttons)

activeButtonSecondaryFgOver.comment: default active button additional text with mouse over

activeLineFg.comment: default active line (like code input field bottom border when you log in and field is focused)

activeLineFgError.comment: default active line for error state (like code input field bottom border when you log in and you've entered incorrect code)

lightButtonBg.comment: default light button background (like buttons in boxes)

lightButtonBgOver.comment: default light button background with mouse over

lightButtonFgOver.comment: default light button text with mouse over

attentionButtonFg.comment: default attention button text (like confirm button on log out)

attentionButtonFgOver.comment: default attention button text with mouse over

attentionButtonBgOver.comment: default attention button background with mouse over

menuBgOver.comment: default popup menu item background with mouse over

menuBgRipple.comment: default popup menu item ripple effect

menuIconFg.comment: default popup menu item icon (like main menu)

menuIconFgOver.comment: default popup menu item icon with mouse over

menuSubmenuArrowFg.comment: default popup menu submenu arrow icon (like in message field context menu in case of RTL system language)

menuFgDisabled.comment: default popup menu item disabled text (like unavailable items in message field context menu)

menuSeparatorFg.comment: default popup menu separator (like in message field context menu)

scrollBarBg.comment: default scroll bar current rectangle, the bar itself (like in chats list)

scrollBarBgOver.comment: default scroll bar current rectangle with mouse over it

scrollBgOver.comment: default scroll bar background with mouse over the scroll bar

smallCloseIconFg.comment: small X icon (like in Show all sessions box to the right for sessions termination)

smallCloseIconFgOver.comment: small X icon with mouse over

radialFg.comment: default radial loader line (like in Media Viewer when loading a photo)

radialBg.comment: default radial loader background (like in Media Viewer when loading a photo)

placeholderFg.comment: default input field placeholder when field is not focused (like in phone input field when you log in)

placeholderFgActive.comment: default input field placeholder when field is focused

inputBorderFg.comment: default input field bottom border (like in code input field when you log in and field is not focused)

filterInputBorderFg.comment: default rounded input field border (like in chats list search field when field is focused)

filterInputActiveBg.comment: default rounded input field active background (like in chats list search field when field is focused)

filterInputInactiveBg.comment: default rounded input field inactive background (like in chats list search field when field is inactive)

sliderBgInactive.comment: default slider not active bar (like in Settings when you choose interface scale or custom notifications count)

sliderBgActive.comment: default slider active bar (like in Settings when you choose interface scale or custom notifications count)

tooltipBg.comment: tooltip background (like when you put mouse over the message timestamp and wait)

titleShadow.comment: one pixel line shadow at the bottom of custom window title

titleBg.comment: custom window title background when window is inactive

titleBgActive.comment: custom window title background when window is active

titleButtonBg.comment: custom window title minimize/maximize/restore button background when window is inactive (Windows only)

titleButtonFg.comment: custom window title minimize/maximize/restore button icon when window is inactive (Windows only)

titleButtonBgOver.comment: custom window title minimize/maximize/restore button background with mouse over when window is inactive (Windows only)

titleButtonFgOver.comment: custom window title minimize/maximize/restore button icon with mouse over when window is inactive (Windows only)

titleButtonBgActive.comment: custom window title minimize/maximize/restore button background when window is active (Windows only)

titleButtonFgActive.comment: custom window title minimize/maximize/restore button icon when window is active (Windows only)

titleButtonBgActiveOver.comment: custom window title minimize/maximize/restore button background with mouse over when window is active (Windows only)

titleButtonFgActiveOver.comment: custom window title minimize/maximize/restore button icon with mouse over when window is active (Windows only)

titleButtonCloseBg.comment: custom window title close button background when window is inactive (Windows only)

titleButtonCloseFg.comment: custom window title close button icon when window is inactive (Windows only)

titleButtonCloseBgOver.comment: custom window title close button background with mouse over when window is inactive (Windows only)

titleButtonCloseFgOver.comment: custom window title close button icon with mouse over when window is inactive (Windows only)

titleButtonCloseBgActive.comment: custom window title close button background when window is active (Windows only)

titleButtonCloseFgActive.comment: custom window title close button icon when window is active (Windows only)

titleButtonCloseBgActiveOver.comment: custom window title close button background with mouse over when window is active (Windows only)

titleButtonCloseFgActiveOver.comment: custom window title close button icon with mouse over when window is active (Windows only)

titleFg.comment: custom window title text when window is inactive (Windows 11 and macOS)

titleFgActive.comment: custom window title text when window is active (Windows 11 and macOS)

trayCounterBgMute.comment: tray icon counter background if all unread messages are muted

trayCounterBgMacInvert.comment: tray icon counter background when tray icon is pressed or when dark theme of macOS is used (macOS only)

trayCounterFgMacInvert.comment: tray icon counter text when tray icon is pressed or when dark theme of macOS is used (macOS only)

layerBg.comment: box and main menu background layer fade

cancelIconFg.comment: default for settings close icon and box search cancel icon

cancelIconFgOver.comment: default for settings close icon and box search cancel icon with mouse over

boxTextFgGood.comment: accepted box text (like when choosing username that is not occupied)

boxTextFgError.comment: rejecting box text (like when choosing username that is occupied)

boxSearchBg.comment: box search field background (like in contacts box)

boxTitleAdditionalFg.comment: box title additional text (like in create group box when you see chosen members count)

boxTitleCloseFg.comment: settings close icon and box search cancel icon (like in contacts box)

boxTitleCloseFgOver.comment: settings close icon and box search cancel icon (like in contacts box) with mouse over

boxDividerBg.comment: gray divider in boxes and layers

boxDividerFg.comment: gray divider shadow in boxes and layers

paymentsTipActive.comment: tip button text in payments checkout form

membersAboutLimitFg.comment: text in channel members box about the limit (max 200 last members are shown)

contactsBg.comment: contacts (and some other) box row background

contactsBgOver.comment: contacts (and some other) box row background with mouse over

contactsNameFg.comment: contacts (and some other) box row name text

contactsStatusFg.comment: contacts (and some other) box row additional text (like last seen stamp)

contactsStatusFgOver.comment: contacts (and some other) box row additional text (like last seen stamp) with mouse over

contactsStatusFgOnline.comment: contacts (and some other) box row active additional text (like online status)

photoCropFadeBg.comment: avatar crop box fade background (when choosing a new photo in Settings or for a group)

photoCropPointFg.comment: avatar crop box corner rectangles (when choosing a new photo in Settings or for a group)

callArrowFg.comment: received phone call arrow (in calls list box)

callArrowMissedFg.comment: missed phone call arrow (in calls list box)

introErrorFg.comment: login error text (like when providing a wrong log in code)

dialogsMenuIconFg.comment: main menu and passcode lock icon

dialogsMenuIconFgOver.comment: main menu and passcode lock icon with mouse over

dialogsChatIconFg.comment: chat list group or channel icon

dialogsTextFgService.comment: chat list group sender name text (or media message type text)

dialogsSentIconFg.comment: chat list sent message tick / double tick icon

dialogsUnreadBgMuted.comment: chat list unread badge background for muted chat

dialogsBgOver.comment: chat list background with mouse over

dialogsNameFgOver.comment: chat list name text with mouse over

searchedBarBg.comment: search results bar background (in chats list, contacts box..)

walletTitleButtonBgActiveOver.comment: wallet window title minimize/maximize/restore button background with mouse over when window is active (Windows only)

walletTitleButtonFgActiveOver.comment: wallet window title minimize/maximize/restore button icon with mouse over when window is active (Windows only)

walletTitleButtonCloseBg.comment: wallet window title close button background when window is inactive (Windows only)

walletTitleButtonCloseFg.comment: wallet window title close button icon when window is inactive (Windows only)

walletTitleButtonCloseBgOver.comment: wallet window title close button background with mouse over when window is inactive (Windows only)

walletTitleButtonCloseFgOver.comment: wallet window title close button icon with mouse over when window is inactive (Windows only)

walletTitleButtonCloseBgActive.comment: wallet window title close button background when window is active (Windows only)

walletTitleButtonCloseFgActive.comment: wallet window title close button icon when window is active (Windows only)

walletTitleButtonCloseBgActiveOver.comment: wallet window title close button background with mouse over when window is active (Windows only)

walletTitleButtonCloseFgActiveOver.comment: wallet window title close button icon with mouse over when window is active (Windows only)

walletTopIconFg.comment: wallet top refresh and menu icons

walletTopIconRipple.comment: wallet top menu icon ripple effect

sideBarTextFgActive.comment: filters side bar active item text

sideBarIconFgActive.comment: filters side bar active item icon

sideBarBadgeBgMuted.comment: filters side bar unimportant badge background
